replies.author: LU呖呖~呼

1148441066 发表于 2012-12-25 11:42 
A: hi! My name is Him3 days will get to your home!
意思是我：嗨我叫Him3天后会到达你家！
Letter not letter I'll kill you!!!!!
Don't believe? I will kill you...
Don't believe? I will kill you...{:10_523:}
